title: Schedule meetings via WhatsApp using natural language with Gemini AI & Google Suite
description:
### üöÄ How It Works  
Turn your WhatsApp chats into an **AI-powered meeting scheduler** with **Google Gemini**, **Google Calendar**, and **Google Sheets**.  
This workflow understands natural language like _‚ÄúBook a meeting with Ali at 3 PM tomorrow‚Äù_, checks your contacts, avoids overlaps, and updates your calendar automatically all from WhatsApp.  

It‚Äôs a complete AI scheduling system built for founders, teams, and service providers who manage clients over chat.

---

### üîÅ Workflow Overview  
- **WhatsApp Trigger** ‚Üí Captures incoming messages in real time  
- **Intent Agent (Gemini)** ‚Üí Detects scheduling intent (create / edit / cancel)  
- **Google Sheets** ‚Üí Finds contact names, emails, and tags  
- **Get Events** ‚Üí Checks existing meetings to prevent conflicts  
- **Correction Agent + Intent Check** ‚Üí Confirms details with AI  
- **Calendar Agent (Gemini)** ‚Üí Executes the calendar action intelligently  
- **Create / Update / Delete Event** ‚Üí Syncs instantly to Google Calendar  
- **Response Node** ‚Üí Sends WhatsApp and email confirmations  

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è Quick Setup (‚è± ~15 min)
1. **Connect WhatsApp Cloud API** ‚Äì link your WhatsApp Business account  
2. **Authenticate Google Calendar & Sheets** ‚Äì use Sheets for contacts (`Name | Email | Type`)  
3. **Add Google Gemini API Key** ‚Äì used by `Intent`, `Correction`, and `Calendar` agents  
4. **Customize Prompts** ‚Äì adjust tone and language in the Gemini nodes  
5. **Test Your Flow** ‚Äì e.g., message ‚ÄúSchedule meeting with Ali at 10 AM Friday‚Äù to verify calendar and confirmation replies  

üí° *All setup details are also documented inside the workflow sticky notes.*

---

### üß© Integrations  
- WhatsApp Cloud API  
- Google Calendar API  
- Google Sheets API  
- Google Gemini (LLM)  

---

### üí° Benefits  
‚úÖ Automates scheduling directly from WhatsApp  
‚úÖ Understands natural language requests  
‚úÖ Prevents double-bookings automatically  
‚úÖ Sends instant confirmations  
‚úÖ Saves hours of manual coordination  

---

### üë• Ideal For  
- Entrepreneurs & consultants managing clients on WhatsApp  
- Sales or support teams booking demos and meetings  
- Virtual assistants and AI service providers  
- Anyone who wants a **24/7 AI calendar manager**  

---
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
